hooks.command: file_path=$(cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty'); if [ -n "$file_path" ]; then result=$(breadcrumb check "$file_path" 2>/dev/null); status=$(echo "$result" | jq -r '.status // "clear"'); if [ "$status" = "warn" ]; then echo "⚠️ BREADCRUMB WARNING: $(echo "$result" | jq -r '.suggestion')"; exit 2; fi; fi
